content: 4 single_crochet decrease *2 times 10 stuff the body 🐙 now crochet the arms 8 in total s p 1 single_crochet ch10 starting into 2nd chain from hook o o y s n work 7 single_crochet along thea chain 2 half_double_crochet then make n a single_crochet into the stitch from which the chain emerged = the first single_crochet 🐙for the second and third arm repeat all steps as done for the first one for the fourth arm work the last single_crochet into the next stitch work the 5th 6th and 7th arm again the same way as the first three in the 8th arm work the last single_crochet into the same first stitch from the first arm this way you have skipped two extra single_crochet s working only 8 arms over a total of 10 sts this chart should explain what happened here s p o o y s n a n 🐙 using white thread make the eye into an amr work 6 single_crochet attach a bead to the center sew own the eyes directly at the base of the arms i have additionally decorated my octopus with embroidered spots s p o o y s n a n this tiny fellow is finished now you can be proud and show off your work i hope you ve enjoyed crocheting with me you can find me instagram @nansyoops vkontakte vk com/nansyoops my shop on livemaster www livemaster ru/ankris facebook facebook com/nansyoops
